biotools.summary:
Data generated through Bioplatforms Australia’s National Framework Initiatives is available via the Bioplatforms Australia Data Portal. 
The Data Portal API allows programmatic access via the standard CKAN API. The API can be accessed from commonly used programming languages including Python and R.

bioschemas.name: Bioplatforms Australia Data Portal API
